name: LanguageServiceClient
title: Google
Cloud
Language
V1
LanguageServiceClient
description: Provides text analysis operations such as sentiment analysis and entity recognition.

params.name: credentials
params.description: Provides the means for authenticating requests made by the client. This parameter can be many types. A Google::Auth::Credentials uses a the properties of its represented keyfile for authenticating requests made by this client. A String will be treated as the path to the keyfile to be used for the construction of credentials for this client. A Hash will be treated as the contents of a keyfile to be used for the construction of credentials for this client. A GRPC::Core::Channel will be used to make calls through. A GRPC::Core::ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client. The channel credentials should already be composed with a GRPC::Core::CallCredentials object. A Proc will be used as an updater_proc for the Grpc channel. The proc transforms the metadata for requests, generally, to give OAuth credentials.

params.name: scopes
params.description:
The OAuth scopes for this service. This parameter is ignored if
an updater_proc is supplied.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

methods.name: analyze_sentiment
title: Google
Cloud
Language
V1
LanguageServiceClient#analyze_sentiment
methods.description: Analyzes the sentiment of the provided text.

params.name: document
params.description: Input document. A hash of the same form as Google::Cloud::Language::V1::Document can also be provided.

params.name: encoding_type
params.description: The encoding type used by the API to calculate sentence offsets.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: analyze_entities
title: Google
Cloud
Language
V1
LanguageServiceClient#analyze_entities
methods.description: Finds named entities (currently proper names and common nouns) in the text along with entity types, salience, mentions for each entity, and other properties.

params.name: document
params.description: Input document. A hash of the same form as Google::Cloud::Language::V1::Document can also be provided.

params.name: encoding_type
params.description: The encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: analyze_entity_sentiment
title: Google
Cloud
Language
V1
LanguageServiceClient#analyze_entity_sentiment
methods.description: Finds entities, similar to Google::Cloud::Language::V1::LanguageService::AnalyzeEntities in the text and analyzes sentiment associated with each entity and its mentions.

params.name: document
params.description: Input document. A hash of the same form as Google::Cloud::Language::V1::Document can also be provided.

params.name: encoding_type
params.description: The encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: analyze_syntax
title: Google
Cloud
Language
V1
LanguageServiceClient#analyze_syntax
methods.description: Analyzes the syntax of the text and provides sentence boundaries and tokenization along with part of speech tags, dependency trees, and other properties.

params.name: document
params.description: Input document. A hash of the same form as Google::Cloud::Language::V1::Document can also be provided.

params.name: encoding_type
params.description: The encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

params.name: document
params.description: Input document. A hash of the same form as Google::Cloud::Language::V1::Document can also be provided.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: annotate_text
title: Google
Cloud
Language
V1
LanguageServiceClient#annotate_text
methods.description: A convenience method that provides all the features that analyzeSentiment, analyzeEntities, and analyzeSyntax provide in one call.

params.name: document
params.description: Input document. A hash of the same form as Google::Cloud::Language::V1::Document can also be provided.

params.name: features
params.description: The enabled features. A hash of the same form as Google::Cloud::Language::V1::AnnotateTextRequest::Features can also be provided.

params.name: encoding_type
params.description: The encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.
